summary.para: The following class shows the basics of how to use the MSTest framework, including:

list.item: How a test of valid code should look.

summary.para: This test makes sure the right kind of exception is thrown when trying to create a formula with no tokens.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestInvalidToken_Invalid
member.summary: Formula with an invalid symbol should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestVariableAndOperators_Valid
member.summary: Formula with a variable and operators should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestMissingClosingParen_Invalid
member.summary: Formula missing a closing parenthesis should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestMatchedParentheses_Valid
member.summary: Formula with properly matched parentheses should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestTooManyClosingParens_Invalid
member.summary: Too many closing parentheses should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestNestedParens_Valid
member.summary: Nested balanced parentheses should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestFirstTokenNumber_Valid
member.summary: Make sure a simple well formed formula is accepted by the constructor.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestFirstTokenOperator_Invalid
member.summary: Formula starting with an operator should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestFirstTokenVariable_Valid
member.summary: Formula starting with a variable should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestFirstTokenParen_Valid
member.summary: Formula starting with a parenthesis should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestLastTokenOperator_Invalid
member.summary: Formula ending with an operator should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestLastTokenNumber_Valid
member.summary: Formula ending with a number should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestLastTokenVariable_Valid
member.summary: Formula ending with a variable should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestLastTokenParen_Valid
member.summary: Formula ending with a closing parenthesis should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestTwoNumbersInARow_Invalid
member.summary: Number followed directly by another number should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestOperatorFollowedByNumber_Valid
member.summary: Operator followed by a valid number should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestParenFollowedByNumber_Valid
member.summary: Opening parenthesis followed by a number should be valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestClosingParenFollowedByNumber_Invalid
member.summary: Closing parenthesis followed by a number should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestTwoVariablesInARow_Invalid
member.summary: Variable followed directly by another variable should throw an exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestVariableFollowedByOperator_Valid
member.summary: Variable followed by operator is valid.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestNumberFollowedByVariable_Invalid
member.summary: Number followed by variable without operator should throw exception.

member.name: M:CS3500.FormulaTests.FormulaSyntaxTests.FormulaConstructor_TestComplexValidFormula_Valid
member.summary: Complex but valid formula should be accepted.
